title: Here Lies Love (1950) That night Ellen went to the strange dark house on the cliff...

sources.title: Here Lies Love (1950) That night Ellen went to the strange dark house on the cliff...
sources.description:
A mind haunted by guilt, a life sabotaged by shadows... and a love that might be the only light.
Ellen Foster visits her aunt on the California coast and meets Jeff Cohalan, a tormented architect living in an ultramodern clifftop house. When Jeff's life unravels after his fianc√©e's mysterious death‚Äîamid a series of sinister "accidents"‚ÄîEllen risks everything to expose the vengeful plot behind his misfortunes.

Original Title: The Second Woman (1950) | AKA: Here Lies Love / Ellen

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/3DoemRrcA6s
